column4: I'm running a vanilla install of Ubuntu Server and I was wondering what is the most lightweight X package I can use?
ya, how would I get that?
I don't need taskbars or any gadget
explore the package managers search feature
but what is the basic X framwork?
how do I install just that
can I not run a single program without a window manager?
make a .xinitrc that runs the app... and just the app.. then use 'startx' from console  done
enable the alt-ctrl-backspace to kill X feature also.. or ya can get stuck
